title: 毛豆的写写画画
content:
[[module CSS]]
/*
    Powered on 2022/06/01 13:20:57
    [2022 Wikidot Theme]
    Created by xywy
    CC BY-SA 3.0
*/

.page-rate-widget-box {
    display: inline-block;
    border-radius: 5px;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5);
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-right: 2em;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points {
    background-color: #399890 !important;
    border: solid 1px #399890;
    border-right: 0;
    border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup,
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown {
    background-color: #fff6f0;
    border-top: solid 1px #399890;
    border-bottom: solid 1px #399890;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a,
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a {
    background: transparent;
    color: #399890;
    padding: 0 4px;
    margin: 0 1px;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:hover,
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:hover {
    background: #399890;
    color: #fffff0;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel {
    background-color: #399890;
    border: solid 1px #399890;
    border-left: 0;
    border-radius: 0 5px 5px 0;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a {
    background: transparent;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #fffff0;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a:hover {
    border-radius: 0 3px 3px 0;
    background: #399890;
    color: #fffff0;
    text-decoration: none;
}

div.scp-image-caption{
 display: none;
    width: 100%;
}

a:visited {
  color: #399890;
}

h1, #page-title {
    color:#000000;
    padding: 0 0 0.25em;
    margin: 0 0 0.6em;
    font-weight: normal;
}

#search-top-box {
    display: none;
}

a.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #399890;
}

a {
    color: #399890;
}

#side-bar a {
    color:#399890;
}
 
#side-bar a:visited {
    color:#399890;
}
 
#side-bar a.newpage {
    color:#399890;
}
 
#side-bar a.collapsible-block-link {
    color:#399890;
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    padding: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #283e30;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgb(0 0 0) !important;
    background: #d7f7f5 !important;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

div#container-wrap {
    background: url('https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/xywy-2/body_bg.jpg') top left repeat-x;
}

.side-block .menu-item > .image {
  filter: hue-rotate(15.8rad) brightness(200%);
}

div#side-bar div.side-block {
    background: #CCEEEB;
    border: 1px solid #399890;
}
div#side-bar div.side-block div.heading,
div#side-bar div.collapsible-block-unfolded-link,
div#side-bar div.collapsible-block-unfolded-link div.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #399890;
    border-color: #399890;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:hover,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:focus {
    background: #168090;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:focus,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:hover {
    background: #399890;
}
div.open-menu a {
    color: #399890!important;
    border-color: #399890!important;
}

[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab 名帖]]
[[size 150%]][[collapsible show="- 写在前面" hide="- 关闭"]][[/size]]
印象／指定色染卡+没章法的毛笔字+简单的ps组合，图片加载需要一些时间。如果你也想要可以加QQ1809271579发消息或者wiki私信等啥都可以，我也会主动写更多，给大家写字很开心！
图片大概按字母顺序排列
[[/collapsible]]
